title: Taken IGNs that's bind to forever lvl 1 accounts or inactive for a long time that is low lvl
body:
I'd like to change my IGN to 'Sunhee' which belongs to another player but is inactive for a long time (my speculation), a level 1 account with no games made but it is there. Any chance of the account being deleted and freeing up the IGN and have the chance to take it?

Here is the account I am referring to -- https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Sunhee

replies.body:
Hi - the rules surrounding older account names can be found here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up- 

Basically, the names of level 1 inactive accounts become available after 6 months of inactivity - there's more detail in that article about the hows and whys though!
Thank you! This info helped me a lot. _*waiting game commenced*_
I'm really not sure you thought about this. I'ts not how the world works i'm afraid.
